name: Hopshot (MCKoleman, RobArtzy, Swordlock, Spide6667)
description:
Play as a robot being tested through a series of increasingly difficult trials. Use your Hopgun to bounce around all kinds of obstacles!

Controls:
[WASD] to move
[Space] to jump
[Mouse] to aim
[Left click] to bounce

Common Issues:
The game uses LootLocker for leaderboards, and it is possible that your antivirus will misidentify leaderboard operations as threats. If your exe disappears or your game won't run, check your antivirus and either remove the game from quarantine or allow it to run.
